function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor IAQ can increase the risk of respiratory diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation and air quality management.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, air quality sensors.","People":"Building occupants, especially those in areas with poor IAQ.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Reduced air exchanges due to modified building openings can lead to increased outdoor time and higher risk of mosquito exposure in malarious areas.","Impact":"Higher risk of being bitten by malaria-causing mosquitoes due to increased outdoor time.","Mitigation":"Balancing thermal comfort with proper ventilation to reduce outdoor exposure.","Technologies":"Passive ventilation systems, thermal comfort modeling.","People":"Building occupants in malarious areas, public health authorities.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of close synergies with built environment professionals during building envelope modifications can compromise indoor air quality.","Impact":"Compromised indoor air quality due to building envelope modifications.","Mitigation":"Ensuring close collaboration with built environment professionals during modifications.","Technologies":"Building simulation software, building physics principles.","People":"Built environment professionals, building owners, facility managers.","Owner":"Built environment professionals, building owners, facility managers."}]}
